sub_topic: Identification of the structure of a compound using nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy
message_1: What is the structure of an unknown compound X based on the 1H-NMR and 13C-NMR spectra obtained from the compound using nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy techniques?
message_2:
To determine the structure of an unknown compound X using 1H-NMR and 13C-NMR spectra, I would need the actual data from the spectra, including chemical shifts, splitting patterns, and integration values for the 1H-NMR, as well as chemical shifts for the 13C-NMR. 

Once the data is provided, I can help you interpret the spectra and deduce the structure of the compound.
